org.cicirello.math.rand.EnhancedSplittableGenerator

Packages that use EnhancedSplittableGenerator
Package
Description
org.cicirello.math.rand
Collection of classes related to random number generation.

  • Uses of EnhancedSplittableGenerator in org.cicirello.math.rand

    Methods in org.cicirello.math.rand that return EnhancedSplittableGenerator
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static EnhancedSplittableGenerator
    EnhancedSplittableGenerator.of(String algorithmName)
    Gets an EnhancedSplittableGenerator wrapping an instance of any random number generator supported by your version of Java as specified by its name, as documented via the RandomGenerator.SplittableGenerator.of(java.lang.String) method.
    final EnhancedSplittableGenerator
    EnhancedSplittableGenerator.split()
    Returns a new EnhancedSplittableGenerator split off from this one, such that the new one wraps a split of the wrapped random number generator.
    final EnhancedSplittableGenerator
    EnhancedSplittableGenerator.split(RandomGenerator.SplittableGenerator source)
    Returns a new EnhancedSplittableGenerator split off from this one, such that the new one wraps a split of the wrapped random number generator.
